name: Kataranta
description:
A unique take on endless runners!

Controls for Windows:

  • A to decelerate
  • D to accelerate
  • E to become immune for a short period of time.

Controls for Android:

  • Left Buttons are Decelerate and Accelerate, respectively.
  • Right Buttons are Immunity and Jump, respectively.

Made in Godot by Lavarel:

  • Program/Assets: Jude Timothy Joshua Bomban (some free assets were taken from itch.io)
  • Sound Design: Josh Reuven Ramos Mission and Renson Nicor

Venue: Manila/Philippines - GJ+ 21/22

#GJ+ #GameJamPlus2021 #beourplus1
